body.name: Nictemaw Portable Washing Machine 17.8 Lbs Mini Compact Washing Machine Washer Laundry Washer And Dryer With Drain Pump, 10 Programs Selections with LED Display Low Noise and Easy Store for Apartments
features: 💦 Easy to Operate: When receiving the portable washing machines, it can be used directly without assembly.And you can choose three washing modes according to your needs. Simply put in clothes and detergent, fill with water, set the timer and start washing/spinning. Equipped with a built-in drainage pump, the machine can quickly discharge the water from the tub. The filter device in the tub can also collect debris with a powerful cleaning function.

💦 Separate Time Control & Noise Reduction:The washer and dryer has separate timer control, which make laundry washing more convenient and efficient. You could choose the suitable time when washing based on clothes types. Its noise is under 20 dB, which is quiet enough for you to run the machine even at night. It will not disturb your life when use it.

💦 Portable and Widely Use: This washing machine is lightweight, does not deform and rust easily, and has a long service life. The washer produces the powerful water flow that effectively cleans clothes and reduces wear. It is equipped with a drain hose to easily drain out dirty water which is good choice for apartment or dorm doing medium or little weight laundry.

💦 Save Water and Electricity: The semi-automatic washing machine is compact and low power to save a lot of water and power. The dual motor system of washer presents strong laundry power, which shows in the washing power and spinning power .The True rinse technology delivers the best rinsing results ever. You can still enjoy the good quality washing and drying from our washing machine and dryer.

💦 Considerable design & Energy saving: Small size with low power consumption can save much energy. Convenient for home use. Easy assembly is required with all accessories packed in the package. Feel free to contact seller if you have any product issue, we will respond within 24hrs and help you solve it.
body.description: Nictemaw Full-Automatic Portable Washing Machine RENEW YOUR LIFE BIG CAPACITY - 8KG capacity can meet all your daily laundry needs with durable performance.FAST CLEANING - Nictemaw can finish washing in 15 minutes at the fastest.ADJUSTABLE - 10 Washing Programs 8 Water Leval meet all your washing duty. This Full-Automatic washing machine is perfect for those with a need to multi-task, save space and may want to save themselves a trip to the expensive laundromat. Compact design saves more space for your home. Child Lock makes it more safe for your family!

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.4 3.4 out of 5 stars 3 ratings 3.4 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Nictemaw Portable Full-Automatic Washing Machine (2 In 1)--Wash Clothes Clean and Fast! This compact fully automatic portable mini washing machine adopts fully automatic programming design, which is a good helper to share housework, with water inlet, outlet, rotation and water flow functions to save time, labor and water consumption. The washing machine with large wave pulsation can reduce the deformation of clothes, and also has better cleaning and washing effects. SMART CONTROL PANEL This washing machine is very easy to operate via its touch control panel. Heavy, Soft, Normal, Rapid and Soak programs, you are allowed to quickly start the machine as you need. You can customize washing program by selecting load size, adding additional wash time, rinse time and spin time as well. 2-IN-1 Compact Design Features a compact and integrated design saves more space. Full-automatic system for efficient cleaning and drying of clothes with just one click. The efficient spin dryer can dry your clothes quickly, taking 97% of the water out!

Load capacity: 17.8lbs (8Kg)Color: Black&WhiteInner Tub Material: 304 Stainless SteelDimensions: 21.26*21.26*35.43 inchPower Supply: 110v / 60hzRated Power: 310W Product weight: 19KG Nictemaw Full-Automatic Portable Washing Machine RENEW YOUR LIFE BIG CAPACITY - 8KG capacity can meet all your daily laundry needs with durable performance.FAST CLEANING - Nictemaw can finish washing in 15 minutes at the fastest.ADJUSTABLE - 10 Washing Programs 8 Water Leval meet all your washing duty. This Full-Automatic washing machine is perfect for those with a need to multi-task, save space and may want to save themselves a trip to the expensive laundromat. Compact design saves more space for your home. Child Lock makes it more safe for your family!

10 washing programs and 8 water level selections can meet all your washing needs.Equipped with a drain pump and an extended drain pipe to meet the cleaning needs of low drainage.With washing and dehydration functions, 17.8 lbs large capacity to wash more clothes at a time.Time/Space-Saving: The washer control timer runs for up to 15 minutes, while the spin cycle timer runs for up to 5 minutes per load.With 24-hour delay function, you can choose any time to wash your clothes.Space saving, perfect for your room/RV/dormitory.Child lock to prevent children from accidentally touching.Automatic imbalance detection prevents severe vibration.High-quality and durable motor provides stable power.

Child Lock Function Don’t worry about the child accidentally touch the washing machine. Protect the child touch the machine, bring more safety to your family! 24 Hours Smart Delay Function With 24 hour delay function. You can choose the desired start time by pressing the program button, and it is flexible to arrange your own time. Auto Unbalance Detection Stainless steel body ensures this machine will never be rust eaten and equipped with Auto Unbalance Detection. It's able to automatically fix the unbalance issue through allowing more water to come in. Low Energy Consumption The latest technology motor works with extremely low noise and high power to ensure the best cleaning performance. The energy consumption is very low.

BUILT-IN DRAIN PUMP The washing machine is equipped with an extended drain pipe and a drain pump to help your washing machine drain water easily and quickly. If the faucet does not match the inlet hose, you can use the adapter included in the accessories. 304 Stainless Steel Inner Tub With a more durable 304 stainless steel tub, providing more protection for your clothes. AUD function solve the problem of unbalanced laundry loading. Nictemaw Portable Full-Automatic Washing Machine Barrel self-cleaning: Deep protection of the washing environmentFully automatic system, equipped with a single cylinder & drain pump, the washing machine can not only be used to wash clothes, but also can be used to shake off clothes moisture. And washing and dehydration can be used separately,You only need to set the washing/spinning program, and then it can work alone.Considerable design & Energy saving : Plastic body ensures this machine will never be rust eaten. Always quiet, neat and clean. Small size with low power consumption can save much energy.

Suitable for many occasions Easy to move and transport to anywhere, lightweight and space-saving design allows it easily fit in a bathroom or closet, ideal for camping trips, dormitories, home, apartments, RV or anywhere with limited space. NOTE: To get rid of the mud and sand on clothing before washing.If the water is below the minimum water level the impeller will not turn.Clothing with colors may easily rub off and may be washed separately from other clothes.When do fine cleaning, like Women's underwear, thin nylon and polyester materials, please put it into washing bag.When unpacking the machine you might see a black rectangle plastic piece under the bottom of the machine please remove it before using the machine.Only fill in cold water when washing clothes, please do not wash clothes in hot water, otherwise the machine may be damaged.Please Acknowledge Before Purchasing: To ensure the quality, product will do water intake and drainage tests by manufacturer. It will be re-cleaned, but may have some water left inside to cause wet/water stain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Leaked all over on 1st use!
reviews.reviewText: On first use, this washing machine leaked all over the floor. Contacted seller via email (this was suggested when I first looked at returning), seller did not respond.Initiated an Amazon return, but the postage to return the item is over $200.00!Wasted time and money and am adding to the landfill. I'm not going to pack it up and spend that kind of money to return it.This is the second time I've ordered this machine and twice it has had issues. I give up.Don't risk it! It's not worth the hassles.
